title: RIOT BRING BACK LEAGUGE SELECT OPTION ON ESPORTS MAIN SITE
body:
BECAUSE I CANNOT LOOK UP HISTORICAL INFORMATION ON NON MSI MATCHES!  All the Leagues such as NA/EU/LCK/Challenger Spring Split so on so forth has been "erased".  For example:  If I wanted to look up game statistics on the SKT vs GE Finals I cannot BECAUSE IT IS GONE.


I know MSI is important but DONT MESS THE ENTIRE WEBSITE FOR NO REASON!

replies.body: Information STILL Hidden even today... I guess RIOT didn't get the message...

And here it is. The, I don't want to search externally for game data.

Welcome to a brand new age, where the whole internet can be used.
